description: Direct use of native SQL for user lookup in getByUsername, bypassing JPA and security controls. This is a major maintainability and security anti-pattern.
Bypasses repository method findByUsername in getByUsername, reducing maintainability and testability. Violates DRY and Clean Code.
DUMMY_HASH is not a valid bcrypt hash, which may cause timing differences and reduce effectiveness of timing attack mitigation. Should use a real bcrypt hash.
